name: exemplar
description: A quality module! A downright splendid paragon of programming.

scripts.test: echo Error: no test verification && exit 1
scripts.security:default: echo Error: no security verification && exit 1
scripts.style:default: echo Error: no style verification && exit 1
scripts.misc:default: echo Error: no misc verification && exit 1
scripts.doc:default: echo Error: no doc verification && exit 1
scripts.verify: npm-run-all test security:* style:* misc:* doc:* --silent --continue-on-error

author: William Hilton <wmhilton@gmail.com>
